existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-page website for a government-approved construction company with the following pages/sections and English user-facing text: Home (hero + value proposition), About (company overview), Services, Projects/Portfolio, Government Approvals & Compliance (approval statement, certification/permit list, approval/registration numbers as text fields), Safety & Quality, and Contact (address/phone/email + contact form).

Implement a coherent visual theme suitable for a government-approved construction brand (professional, trustworthy, industrial) and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, colors, buttons, cards, and section layouts (avoid blue/purple as dominant colors).
Add a reusable header (logo + navigation) and footer (quick links, contact details, business hours, and compliance disclaimer text) visible across the site.

Create a Projects/Portfolio section with a grid of project cards (title, location, year, short description, and image) and a project detail view/modal for each item using local seed data (no external API).
Implement a Contact form that allows visitors to submit inquiries (name, email, phone, subject, message) and persist submissions in the Motoko backend canister.
Add a simple admin-only page to view submitted contact inquiries (list view + detail view) protected by Internet Identity login; only authenticated users can access the admin route.

Add basic SEO and trust signals: set page titles/metadata per page, include a prominent 'Government Approved' badge/mark on the Home page, and include an Approvals & Compliance summary block on the Home page that links to the full compliance page.
Integrate required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them in the UI (no backend image serving).
